name: HGH Fragment 176-191
overview: A modified fragment of human growth hormone (amino acids 176-191) that was researched for its potential fat-reducing effects without the growth-promoting properties of full HGH. Closely related to AOD-9604.
who_should_avoid: severe metabolic disorders without medical supervision
interactions_notes: Limited interaction data. May affect fat metabolism. Discuss with clinician if taking diabetes medications, thyroid medications, or other metabolic therapies.
dosing_ranges_literature: Research protocols have explored doses ranging from 250-500 mcg administered once or twice daily, typically on an empty stomach before exercise or in the morning.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.

references.title: HGH fragment and lipid metabolism
references.note: Early research on the lipolytic effects of HGH fragments.

references.title: Growth hormone fragments for obesity treatment
references.note: Overview of HGH fragment research in weight management.
